entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:33 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 08:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -32.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -35.8°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
